item.title: ROIV
item.description: score:2 Chances: Immunovant, Inc. announced that results from the initial cohort of patients in the Phase 2 clinical trial of batoclimab in Gravesâ€™ disease exceeded 50% response rates, indicating promising potential for the drug Risks: Oral brepocitinib failed to meet its primary endpoint of Systemic Lupus Erythematosus Responder Index (SRI-4) change of 4 at Week 52, indicating a setback in the drug’s development for this specific indication Score:2 chances characters count - risks characters count = 2
